attributes.name: value
attributes.title: Value
attributes.description: Value between 1 and 100 to represent the progress visually and to assistive technologies

attributes.name: paused
attributes.title: Paused
attributes.description: Sets the paused state of the progress component

slots.name: determinate
slots.title: Determinate slot
slots.description: Slot to provide custom visual representations of the determinate progress ring

slots.name: indeterminate
slots.title: Indeterminate slot
slots.description: Slot to provide custom visual representations of the indeterminate progress ring
